alert.note: Alert for Schuyler; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Steuben; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 11:20AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Gusty rain showers will impact portions of Seneca, western Schuyler, Yates, northwestern Cayuga and Steuben Counties through NOON EDT... At 1117 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of heavy showers along a line extending from near Ontario to near South Dansville to 6 miles southeast of Shinglehouse. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. A few lightning strikes may occur. SOURCE...Radar indicated and surface base observations. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Corning, Hornell, Seneca Falls, Bath, Waterloo, Penn Yan, Hector, Romulus, Fayette and Starkey. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 near 41. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 34 North and 46. Interstate 390 between 1 and 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Schuyler; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Steuben; Yates
